message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $120 is a bit tight for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but $135 is still a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to go up to $125. Can we meet in the middle again?
I'm glad we're close to a deal, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I can meet you at $130, which is just $5 above your latest offer. Is that something you'd be comfortable with?

I appreciate the compromise, but $130 is still a bit higher than I'd like to pay. I'm willing to go up to $125, just like my previous offer. Can we meet at $127.50? That's the middle ground between my previous offer and your latest one.
I see you're trying to find the sweet spot, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $128, which is just $0.50 above your latest offer. It's a small concession, but I think it's worth it to get a deal done.
I appreciate the small concession, but $128 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you at $125, just like my previous offer. Can we really meet at this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to the bottom line, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $129, which is just $1 above your latest offer. This is my final concession, so I hope we can make a deal at this price.
I appreciate your final concession, but $129 is still above my budget. I'm afraid I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I'm going to go talk to John and see if he can work something out for me.
